accept.description: Accept the file type to be uploaded

:beforeUpload.description: The hook before uploading the file, the parameter is the uploaded file, if it returns 'false', the upload will be stopped. Support to return a Promise object, stop uploading when the Promise object rejects, and start uploading when resolve (resolve passes in 'File' or 'Blob' objects, upload resolve incoming objects); You can also return 'Upload.LIST_IGNORE', in which case the file will not appear in the list. **Note: IE9 does not support this method**
:beforeUpload.description_zh: 上传文件之前的钩子，参数为上传的文件，若返回 `false` 则停止上传。支持返回一个 Promise 对象，Promise 对象 reject 时则停止上传，resolve 时开始上传（ resolve 传入 `File` 或 `Blob` 对象则上传 resolve 传入对象）；也可以返回 `Upload.LIST_IGNORE`，此时列表中将不展示此文件。 **注意：IE9 不支持该方法**

:customRequest.description: By overriding the default upload behavior, you can customize your own upload implementation
:customRequest.description_zh: 通过覆盖默认的上传行为，可以自定义自己的上传实现

:data.description: Upload the required additional parameters or return to the method of uploading additional parameters
:data.description_zh: 上传所需额外参数或返回上传额外参数的方法

:defaultFileList.description: The default list of files that have been uploaded
:defaultFileList.description_zh: 默认已经上传的文件列表

:fileList.description: A list of files that have been uploaded (controlled), if you encounter an issue where 'onChange' is only called once when you use this parameter
:fileList.description_zh: 已经上传的文件列表（受控），使用此参数时，如果遇到 `onChange` 只调用一次的问题

:headers.description: Set the upload request header, which is valid for IE10 or later
:headers.description_zh: 设置上传的请求头部，IE10 以上有效

:isImageUrl.description: Customize whether thumbnails are displayed using <img/> tags
:isImageUrl.description_zh: 自定义缩略图是否使用 标签进行显示

:itemRender.type: (originNode: ReactElement, file: UploadFile, fileList: object[], actions: { download: function, preview: function, remove: function }) => React.ReactNode

listType.description: Built-in styles for upload lists, supporting four basic styles: text, picture, 'picture-card' and 'picture-circle'
listType.description_zh: 上传列表的内建样式，支持四种基本样式 text, picture, `picture-card` 和 `picture-circle`

:maxCount.description: Limit the number of uploads. When it is 1, always replace the current file with the most recently uploaded file
:maxCount.description_zh: 限制上传数量。当为 1 时，始终用最新上传的文件代替当前文件

method.description: The HTTP method of the upload request

multiple.description: Whether it supports multi-select files, 'IE10+' is supported. When turned on, press and hold Ctrl to select multiple files
multiple.description_zh: 是否支持多选文件，`ie10+` 支持。开启后按住 ctrl 可选择多个文件

name.description: The name of the file parameter sent to the backend
name.description_zh: 发到后台的文件参数名

openFileDialogOnClick.description: Click the Open File dialog box

showUploadList.description: Whether or not to display a list of files can be set as an object for setting showPreviewIcon, showRemoveIcon, showDownloadIcon, 'removeIcon' and downloadIcon separately
showUploadList.type: boolean | { showPreviewIcon?: boolean, showRemoveIcon?: boolean, showDownloadIcon?: boolean, previewIcon?: ReactNode | (file: UploadFile) => ReactNode, removeIcon?: ReactNode | (file: UploadFile) => ReactNode, downloadIcon?: ReactNode | (file: UploadFile) => ReactNode }
showUploadList.description_zh: 是否展示文件列表, 可设为一个对象，用于单独设定 showPreviewIcon, showRemoveIcon, showDownloadIcon, `removeIcon` 和 downloadIcon

withCredentials.description: Whether or not the upload request carries a cookie
withCredentials.description_zh: 上传请求时是否携带 cookie

events.name: onChange
events.description: Callback when the uploaded file changes, see [onChange](#onchange) for details.
events.description_zh: 上传文件改变时的回调，详见 [onChange](#onchange)

events.name: onDrop
events.description: A callback function that is executed when a file is dragged into the upload area
events.description_zh: 当文件被拖入上传区域时执行的回调功能

events.name: onDownload
events.description: Click the callback when downloading the file, if not specified, you will be redirected to the tab corresponding to the file URL by default
events.description_zh: 点击下载文件时的回调，如果没有指定，则默认跳转到文件 url 对应的标签页

events.name: onPreview
events.description: Callback when clicking on the file link or preview icon
events.description_zh: 点击文件链接或预览图标时的回调

events.name: onRemove
events.description: Click the callback when removing a file, and do not remove it when the return value is false. A Promise object can be returned, and the Promise object will not be removed when resolve(false) or reject
events.description_zh: 点击移除文件时的回调，返回值为 false 时不移除。支持返回一个 Promise 对象，Promise 对象 resolve(false) 或 reject 时不移除
